data.title: wonderful library
data.text: love the library I could sit in it all day and just read books floor to floor its a good place to take visitors because there is no other library like that in the United States. its beautiful.

data.title: a lot of books
data.text: It's a library, it has a lot of books; But it's worth a visit even if you can't read. It is a wonderful building architecturally speaking, with a nice courtyard,  nice murals and nice exhibits (although they may periodically change).

data.title: Wonderfull world of books
data.text:
Beautiful relaxing a wonder place to explore. 
Our city library has so much to offer.
They have all kinds of programs.
Today there was a group of young children here to learn about the library.
They also has a genealogy section where you can do research.
It was a little noisy today. People no longer whisper.
I found an interesting non fiction book on the Tudors. 
Next time I am going to the University Blvd branch I found out they sell books at a discount. More to add to my own library.

data.title: One of the gems of downtown
data.text: Impressive facilities on 4 levels, with a courtyard in the middle make this a pleasant and productive place to spend an afternoon.

data.title: Massive atrium foyer. Large courtyard
data.text: This library has plenty of outdoor central patio plaza space and an indoor mezzanine that can easily accommodate 100 guests and a caterer.  Unless you are renting it for a function, or using its books and materials, you can check it out in 5 minutes.  You may end up asking yourself why did they spend so much money on massively massive vacant stairwell instead of library materials, research rooms, or content.

data.title: Wow! I Can't Believe...
data.text: Wow, I can't believe I've lived in Jacksonville for over a year and did not visit the Main Library until this afternoon. What a wealth of resources, knowledge and information, all of which are free to resident's of Duval County. The building itself is beautiful, not to mention the fantastic way the inside is maintained. The selection of books, books on CD, periodicals, and computer access is incredible.

data.title: Great event space
data.text: Went here for a wedding reception. It's an amazing space about 100 guest and it was extremely comfortable. Areas were well separated for cocktail hour and dinner, large dance floor as well. The acoustics in the space were outstanding as well. I would definitely have an event in a space like this. The bathrooms were really well maintained as well as for the entire duration of the night. The space as a whole was beautiful and well maintained.
